title: Mouse click breakpoint
content:
Im just start to learn and stuck with problem: trying to set breakpoint on mouse click, but ollydbg log shows me only new thread created or terminated. I did as it is written in these threads: Thread 1 Thread 2

There is my steps: Press ctrl+G -> search for USER32.GetMessageW -> press shift+F4 and set decode expressions as message code (WM_xxx), assume func as winprocw, pause program - never, log value of expressions - always, log func args - always -> OK and going to log window. Maybe i did something wrong?
